page.title: 01Description of our Area.
page.content: Our D Block is on the edge of the {New {Forest.}We have a main road,the A.35, running through the Block to {Southampton.}Our Block is predominately rural and has many farms.The land is mainly fields for grazing and farming.There is one small {caravan site}at Heathfield and residential{mobile home}sites near Bashley Manor Farm.There is one{riding {stable}at Wotton.The only{hotel,}The East Close,is on the A.35.There is only one school and this is for{ {foreign students}to learn English.{ {Ossemsley Manor House}has been turned into flats.There is a large private park called{Hinton Park.}The house in these grounds is the home of {Sir {George Meyrick,}who owns the majority of the land within the Block.
